function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"GPS and Bluetooth technology used for tracking COVID-19 patients","Impact":"Privacy concerns, potential misuse of personal data","Mitigation":"User consent, data encryption, strict access controls","Technologies":"Data encryption, access controls, location anonymization","People":"Users of the tracking application","Owner":"Government of Kerala and the local social communication platform"},{"Description":"Collection and storage of personal health and travel data","Impact":"Potential data breaches, misuse of personal health information","Mitigation":"Data encryption, secure storage, compliance with data protection regulations","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure databases, compliance software","People":"Users of the tracking application","Owner":"Government of Kerala and the local social communication platform"},{"Description":"Notification alert for vicinity near red zone based on user location","Impact":"Potential panic or fear among users, stigma associated with being in red zones","Mitigation":"Clear communication, providing accurate information, mental health support","Technologies":"Location-based notifications, mental health support platforms","People":"Users of the tracking application","Owner":"Government of Kerala and the local social communication platform"}]}
